Statistical Data Subscription Packages
(Hard-copy format)

Convenient, Reliable, and Economical

Yearbook Package

The four statistical yearbooks of the IMF: International Financial Statistics Yearbook, Balance of Payments Statistics Yearbook, Direction of Trade Statistics Yearbook, and Government Finance Statistics Yearbook are available as a package. Because of the different publication dates of the four yearbooks, it may take up to one year to service an order.

Annual Subscription
$415.00 for four yearbooks, with delivery by surface mail

For Faster Delivery:
First Class (U.S. only) please add $40.00
Airmail (Canada and Mexico only), please add $70.00
Airspeed (all other countries), please add $115.00

Combined Subscription Package

The combined subscription package includes all issues of Balance of Payments Statistics Yearbook (yearbook only), Direction of Trade Statistics (quarterly issues and a yearbook), Government Finance Statistics Yearbook (yearbook only), and International Financial Statistics (monthly issues and a yearbook), plus IMF Staff Papers (three issues per year). This subscription package offers the most economical and convenient method available to receive these publications.

Annual Subscription
$1,195.00, with delivery by surface mail

For Faster Delivery:
First Class (U.S. only), please add $200.00
Airmail (Canada and Mexico only), please add $250.00
Airspeed (all other countries), please add $325.00
